Package weka.gui.beans

Class BatchClassifierEvent

java.lang.Object
java.util.EventObject
weka.gui.beans.BatchClassifierEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class BatchClassifierEvent extends EventObject
Class encapsulating a built classifier and a batch of instances to test on.
Since:
1.0
Version:
$Revision: 9263 $
Author:
Mark Hall

  • Constructor Details

    • BatchClassifierEvent

      public BatchClassifierEvent(Object source, Classifier scheme, DataSetEvent trsI, DataSetEvent tstI, int setNum, int maxSetNum)
      Creates a new BatchClassifierEvent instance.
      Parameters:
      source - the source object
      scheme - a Classifier
      trsI - the training instances used to train the classifier
      tstI - the test instances
      setNum - the set number of the test instances
      maxSetNum - the last set number in the series

    • BatchClassifierEvent

      public BatchClassifierEvent(Object source, Classifier scheme, DataSetEvent trsI, DataSetEvent tstI, int runNum, int maxRunNum, int setNum, int maxSetNum)
      Creates a new BatchClassifierEvent instance.
      Parameters:
      source - the source object
      scheme - a Classifier
      trsI - the training instances used to train the classifier
      tstI - the test instances
      runNum - the run number
      maxRunNum - the maximum run number
      setNum - the set number of the test instances
      maxSetNum - the last set number in the series
